name: Just Snake
description:
Classic Snake! With (Optional) VR!

The VR works Seated and uses SteamVR so should work with any SteamVR supported headset.

If you don't have any sort of VR headset just run the game and it should just work!

The snake uses WASD or the touchpad on Vive controllers.

Made in roughly 6 hours for #MiniLD67 :)
